p: We used the gridded Climatic Research Unit (CRU) TS (time-series) 3.10.01 climatic datasets provided by the Climate Research Unit 46 and obtained from the British Atmospheric Data Centre (BADC; http://badc.nerc.ac.uk/). From monthly averages of minimum/maximum temperature and precipitation data over the period 1901â€“2009, a set of bioclimatic parameters was calculated ( Supplementary Table S1) by applying the procedure described by Ramirez-Villegas & Bueno-Cabrera 47.
